column1: This will occur in a member‚Äôs first offence. The nature of this infraction is via ‚Äúverbal warning‚Äù by the moderation team to remind members not to break the rules, such as:
‚Ä¢    Taking things out of context (misquoting, etc)
‚Ä¢    Offensive discord profile (name, avatar, bio, etc)
‚Ä¢    Sharing own or others personal information [TMI behaviour (if you want to share more personal information, do it in DMs)].

Continuous repetition of rule breaking on low level infraction, will result as a first official warning in the form of @X1 role and a 1-day timeout. Continued effort would be met with 1 week timeout and the @X2 and/or @X3 role.

Continuous act of breaking server rules will result in an **IMMEDIATE** first official warning in the form of @X1, which will be appropriately followed by @X2 and/or @X3. However, there are special cases where members will immediately receive @X2 and @X3 depending on the severity of the offense. Here are the categories listed below:
o    Harassment (pick-me behaviour and/or flirting without consent).
o    Hate speech (giving ideas about committing crimes, bullying, etc)
o    Sharing of classified documents (only buzzer can share classified documents)

This is the highest level of infractions that a member or moderators can commit. If **YOU** continue to break the rules after being mediated by the moderators and/or with buzzer, we will have no choice but to take drastic action. But other than continuous rule breaking, there are also server infractions that will result in immediate **BAN**. These are the said infractions:
‚Ä¢    Racist remarks and derogatory remarks (n-word, f-word, etc)
‚Ä¢    Impersonation of Buzzer, his staffs, and his circle (personal and/or professional)
‚Ä¢    Illegal promotion (illegal gambling site, parlays, online loans, crypto, selling drugs and weapons, etc).
1.    Moderators may use the abilities given to them for anything not included in this list that is deemed unacceptable.,
2.    Users of this Server are required to abide by the rules stated above. By using our server, you will be deemed to have read and accepted our rules.
3.    The Mabased Discord Staff reserve the right to change these rules at any time and without prior notice.,
4.    Administrators have the final say on all matters that may arise. Complaints, enquiries and appeals for Discord can be sent to support ticket.

We highly urge the members to not break the rules as we try to foster the Mabased community into a stronger and inclusive social hub. We hope that we can treat one another with civility and respect. Thank you for your attention.","","üëç (20),‚òùÔ∏è (2)"
